Jamie xx Says New The xx Album is Coming

posted by Katie K on October 27, 2014 in News
« PreviousShift + ← Next »Shift + → 1 of
Image via Stephanie Berger

Back in April, we got our first signs that The xx were back at work recording their new album when the band posted a few updates to their Facebook, and now Jamie xx gives us more details on the upcoming LP. In an interview with The Fader, the producer revealed the band’s new album is coming, stating:

“We’ve got quite a lot of songs that are not finished, but I’m excited about it… it feels a lot more free than when we were making the last record. I think the most inspiring thing, really, is just not being anywhere crazy and just being at home.”

He also spoke about his own solo project, telling the magazine that it’s nearly complete and will contain almost three years worth of music. Here’s hoping one of those tracks will spawn a video as beautiful as the visuals for his “Sleep Sound.”

THE XX TRAPPED ME IN A TINY CUBE AND IT MADE ME REALIZE I WAS PART OF SOMETHING MUCH BIGGER
